report.title: Transects line review
report.description: Outputs mappable geometries of transect lines for quick and easy review.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN sample_attribute_values gid on gid.sample_id=s.id and gid.sample_attribute_id=21 and gid.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values utc on utc.sample_id=s.id and utc.sample_attribute_id=27 and utc.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values sid on sid.sample_id=s.id and sid.sample_attribute_id=22 and sid.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values tid on tid.sample_id=s.id and tid.sample_attribute_id=24 and tid.deleted=false
